string-array.item: This is the Top 20 movies screen,if you tap on a movie you will see the movie details.\nif you long press the movie you will be forwarded to the movie images page.
Here you can see the movie details,Movie name,rating,summary.you can also view trailers of the movie.(Red arrow)
In this activity you can choose between posters and backdrops.(Red arrow)
pressing on the spinner will show a list of available trailers.
